content.rendered:
FACIALS AT YORK STREET SPA: Your Path to Radiant Skin

Indulge in the luxurious world of facial treatments at our Ottawa spa, York Street Spa. Our advanced facials are specially designed to cleanse, refresh, and revitalize your skin, leaving it smooth, fresh, and glowing. Whether you’re looking to address specific skin concerns or simply unwind in a tranquil environment, our professional estheticians are here to guide you in choosing the best facial treatments tailored to your individual skin type.

Facial Categories

Aveda Facial

Explore

GM Collins Facial

Explore

Tulasara Experience

Restore your skin to its healthy balance. This customized facial will soothe sensitivities, quench parched skin & purify skin imbalances by combining the power of nature with advanced technology and extensive stress relieving massage techniques targeted to your specific skin type to deliver superior results.

75 MIN

$142

Results & Recovery

Our RMTs use a variety of ottawa massage techniques tailored to fit your specific needs to increase circulation, relieve muscle tension and promote relaxation and flexibility. Excellent for someone looking for a basic massage.

75 MIN

$168

Skin Renewing Facial

This age recovery treatment includes the dynamic results from dual exfoliation, line minimizing, lifting and firming massage customized to focus on specific areas of concern. Skin is quenched, smoother and tighter. Monthly maintenance is recommended for maximum results.

75 MIN

$225

Primary Facial

Ideal as a treatment between full facial treatments to maintain a healthy, balanced skin condition. This is a target facial treatment without an aromatherapy or massage element ideal for younger individuals or for those who prefer a modest facial service.

45 mins

$95

Perfecting Plant Peel

This thermal re-texturizing treatment will smooth the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pore size, restoring youthful radiance without redness or irritation.

30 MINS

$65

or ADD TO ANY FACIAL

$45

Restorative Eye Therapy

Reduce tension and revitalize the skin around the eyes. Get an instant eye lift while reducing fine lines, puffiness and dark circles for brighter, healthier looking eyes.

$32

Add On Aroma Wrap

Turn your facial into complete face & body rejuvenation. Ayurvedic style of dry brushing is used to exfoliate the body, followed by a warm aromatic oil blend & finishing with a comforting wrap of cotton blankets.

$68

  • York Street Spa Invites You To Complete Your Look With A Makeup Application!
  • Visit Our ‘Beauty Enhancers’ Page For Pricing And A List Of Our Cosmetic Services.
  • Prices are subject to change without notice. All pricing will have additional ontario sales tax at time of purchase.
